name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. John J. POTTS

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. John J. POTTS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Garold Tennis, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gilbert J. Scutti, Elizabeth A. Savitt, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
517 A.2d 1292
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. John J. POTTS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1986.
Decided Nov. 25, 1986.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Garold Tennis, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gilbert J. Scutti, Elizabeth A. Savitt, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
